resources.string: An early career programming enthusiast who enjoys developing Android applications with Kotlin & Jetpack Compose. Main focus is building small mobile projects which I find both interesting and beneficial to my understanding of android development, while ultimately producing something of mutual significance to others. Currently focusing on Mobile & Tablet development with Android Jetpack & Jetpack Compose in Kotlin, but look forward to also learning Wear OS, Android TV, and/or Automotive application development in the near future.
